se.ltu.android.demo.scene
Class CameraLeaf

java.lang.Object
  se.ltu.android.demo.scene.Spatial
      se.ltu.android.demo.scene.MetaLeaf
          se.ltu.android.demo.scene.CameraLeaf

public class CameraLeaf
extends MetaLeaf

A Camera object embedded in a scene element leaf. Changing the leafs spatial position will also change the Cameras position.
